name: SX Superstar
description: SX Superstar is a video game of the racing genre by Climax Studios and published by Acclaim under their AKA Acclaim brand. It was released for the Xbox, GameCube, and PlayStation 2. It was announced on April 22, 2003 and was released on June 26, 2003 for GameCube and on June 30, 2003 for Xbox in North America.
